extendedInfo.description: Include widgets:Wifi Toggle: *Quickly enables/disables wifiBluetooth Toggle: *Toggle bluetooth on/offSilent Toggle: *Switch sound/vibrate/silent GPS Toggle:Quick jump to Location sources settingsBrightness level: *Controls screen brightnessAuto Rotate:Toggle of auto-rotate modeAirplane Toggle: *Toggle airplane mode2G/3G Widget:Quick jump to Mobile network settingsApn Toggle (NEW!):GPRS/EDGE on/off* Also available for free

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Very nice works well except for the 2g3g icon does not work I guess because I have 3g4g samsung epic 4g other then that cool app...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best widgets ever.
reviews.comment: I bought the whole package because I liked them better that the stock ones on my droid x.  They fit perfectly on my homescreen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: All good except...
reviews.comment: Everything works. I noticed some developers can do the 1-click gps & 2g/3g data on off.  I hope you can upgrade this rather than both go to settings. Do this and it\'s a perfect app.  Also there is no indication on 2g/3g widget if it\'s on or off. It stags the same.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BEWARE
reviews.comment: Installed but most widgets do not toggle only shortcut to do manually.  I clicked refund, the app uninstalled and developer kept my money. RIP OFF!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The APN is not working
reviews.comment: I think it is better to upgrade the APN widget. I bought a new machine yesterday. And I found APN widget cannot correctly turn on / off the APN connection.   The others widgets are working very well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I really want to give these apps 5 stars. Been using the free ones for some time and decided to purchase.I give the Dev credit as the apn widget is th
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could not install
reviews.comment: Useless instructions. I press an empty space on my screen and the wallpaper app comes up. Razr Maxx. No news of my refund.
reviews.author: Alejandro Parraga

reviews.title: Desperately Needs Update
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using these Widgets for a LONG time, but continued Android OS updates are severely hampering these widgets.  The data toggle widget doesn\'t even work.  An app of this nature cannot be left dev unattended .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy s2
reviews.comment: Data on/off widget causes the app to crash everyone and freezes up phone....needs fixing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has some issues
reviews.comment: Worked well on Sony Xperia with Android 2.3 Gingerbread. Once i updated OS to 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich wifi icon is acting up and gps started requiring a 2 step operation. Before it would simply turn on gps, now takes me to settings :-(
reviews.author: Alexander Meladze

reviews.comment: Good app, needs 4g on/off and mobile Hotspot on/off, 5 stars after that
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says
reviews.comment: However dissapointed I am in how the GPS widget only brings up the location settings, that is how it is described in the app\'s description. Hopefully they will soon create a true standalone GPS toggle update, or I may just find a way to make one because the stock toggle looks like garbage next to these awesome widgets.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works like it should
reviews.comment: I do wish the brightness had less steps. Like Low, then 25%, 50%, 75% 100%.  Right now it goes though to many brightness steps.  @Rick\342\200\223 October 14, 2011: Android doesn\'t allow everything to be toggled. GPS for example can\'t be turned on or off by apps, you must manually do it. All toggle widgets for GPS will take you to the settings screen like that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than the free ones
reviews.comment: I used the free \'one click \' widgets previously, but found them to be slow to respond. These ones look nicer and are quicker for some reason.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Getting many app crashes after the new Ice Cream Sandwich update on my Nexus S\tOther than that it\'s a really good. Widget pack. Too bad about ICS Or I would have waited,  if I knew So Many other apps no longer work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: GPS and 2G/3G toggles don\'t work - go straight to settings menu. Can\'t seem to contact Pavel!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ics nope
reviews.comment: Can\'t seem to get this to work on razr maxx ics,  not much for support.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: These icons are nice and clean, and a lot more colorful then any of the other icons. GPS doesn\'t work right
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Toggle
reviews.comment: This application is not working properly please fix needs to be up date!! I don\'t know how update it
reviews.author: Jose Jaime

reviews.comment: I like that the wifi displays the network name. I don\'t like that the GPS is not an on off toggle, its a shortcut to GPS settings. :/
reviews.author: A Google User
